1003540.name: Shadow Fear™ Bonus Content
1003540.description:
Shadow Fear™ Path to Insanity Bonus Content includes :


  • Full game OST in MP3 that include 17 track...
  • 10 Original Concept & Artworks...
  • The PDF Version of the Concept & Artworks...
  • Full Game Map of all the Area in the Game...
  • The PDF Version of all the Game Map...
  • An Exclusive Artwork that tell all the Golden Coins location...
  • The original trailer for the game featured on Steam...

This DLC is included in the Deluxe Edition Bundle too...

To find the bonus content, locate the Steam Apps folder, open it and locate the Common folder,
open it. Locate the game folder and all this content will be within the Bonus Content folder...

*If you have any problem installing this DLC uninstall the game and reinstall it at the same time as the DLC, it should fix it.*
